name: ahold
content:
get ahold of something
Add to word list
Add to word list
to get something: Drugs are too easy to get ahold of. get ahold of someone
to find or communicate with someone: I'd like to get ahold of Debbie and talk to her about this. grab, take, etc. ahold of something/someone
to take hold of something or someone: I grabbed ahold of his legs and held on so he could not get away. get, grab, etc. ahold of something/someone
to get power or control over someone or something: Once the drugs get ahold of you, it just changes you completely. get/take ahold of yourself
to calm yourself or succeed in controlling your actions or emotions
